conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D isometric cutaway with extruded walls, visible thickness, and an open roof/ceiling exposing the interior volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Skipped due to automatic rejection (missing >50% of rooms/partitions from the 2D plan).

detected_errors.description: Major layout fidelity failure: the 2D plan’s distinct rooms/partitions (separate dining room, defined living room boundaries, enclosed bathroom) are largely absent in the 3D render, which depicts mostly one open space.
Key adjacency and wall geometry do not match the 2D plan (bathroom appears unenclosed/relocated; room separations between kitchen/dining/living are not represented).

summary: Although the second image is genuinely 3D, it omits most of the 2D plan’s room structure and partitions, failing the minimum layout completeness requirement.
